description: Episode of Series "Our multicultural society". Discussion highlights a young Yugoslav girl's desire to become Australian in order to gain acceptance and combat prejudice. By contrast, her Australian friend endorses the continuance of ethnic identity and customs and extols the virtues of a multicultural society.
related_objects: Series; S00537; Our multicultural society; Active; 1978
